calls.title: Pilot Outcomes Review
calls.transcriptText: Before rollout, invoice processing took 12 days end-to-end. In the pilot, we cut that to 4 days, a 66% improvement. We also reduced billing errors by 38% in Q4. We estimate this saves about $420,000 annually.

segments.speaker: Alex Rivera
segments.text: Before rollout, invoice processing took 12 days end-to-end.

segments.speaker: Alex Rivera
segments.text: In the pilot, we cut that to 4 days, a 66% improvement.

segments.speaker: Alex Rivera
segments.text: We also reduced billing errors by 38% in Q4.

segments.speaker: Alex Rivera
segments.text: We estimate this saves about $420,000 annually.

calls.title: Executive Renewal Discussion
calls.transcriptText: The board asked for clear payback, and we showed an 8-month payback period. Adoption is now at 74% across operations and finance. We want to expand this to two more regions next quarter.

segments.speaker: Morgan Lee
segments.text: The board asked for clear payback, and we showed an 8-month payback period.

segments.speaker: Morgan Lee
segments.text: Adoption is now at 74% across operations and finance.

segments.speaker: Morgan Lee
segments.text: We want to expand this to two more regions next quarter.
